title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' action in the jdt.ui3 project, a strange behavior occurs. Selecting xxx as the destination results in the package 'ui' being included in the copied package. The expected behavior is that the copied package should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' action, the resulting package in the destination project contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: The copied package should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open jdt.ui3 project
2. Select xxx as the destination
3. Perform the 'copy package' action
